document_data.name: Shepherd of the Damned
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shepherd of the Damned''' was a unique [[devil]] that delighted in converting the most ineffectual and vulnerable people into zealous followers of a terrible cause.
document_data.Description: Her red skin continually burned with bright orange-red flames.
document_data.Possessions: She wielded a fiendish [[sword]] and [[kite shield]] in battle.
document_data.Relationships: The Shepherd was a long-time ally of the [[succubus]] [[Rohini]].
document_data.History:
''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the Shepherd of the Damned joined Rohini on [[Toril]] during the succubus-prophet's occupation of [[Helm's Hold]]. Rohini enlisted her ally to convert the lowly creatures that dwelled within the city's underground [[Warrens (Helm's Hold)|Warrens]], and bring them over to the cause of the [[Ashmadai]].

That same year the Shepherd was slain by an adventurer dispatched from the city [[Neverwinter]], the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]].
